trans-unit.source: Specifies authentication properties for validating the client certificate.
trans-unit.target: 指定用於驗證用戶端憑證驗證內容。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509ClientCertificateAuthentication.CertificateValidationMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode>, then you must create a custom certificate validator that inherits from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509ClientCertificateAuthentication.CertificateValidationMode%2A>設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode>，則必須建立繼承自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>類別</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>的自訂憑證驗證</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509ClientCertificateAuthentication.CertificateValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][How to: Create a Service that Employs a Custom Certificate Validator](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][如何︰ 建立採用自訂憑證驗證程式服務](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the certificate validation mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定憑證驗證模式。

trans-unit.source: Allowed values of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode> are: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode>
trans-unit.target: Allowed values of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode> are: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode>值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom client certificate validator.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自訂用戶端憑證驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509ClientCertificateAuthentication.CertificateValidationMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode>, you must set the CustomCertificateValidator property to a custom validator that inherits from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509ClientCertificateAuthentication.CertificateValidationMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode>，您必須將 CustomCertificateValidator 屬性設定為自訂的驗證器，繼承自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>類別。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509ClientCertificateAuthentication.CertificateValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [How to: Create a Service that Employs a Custom Certificate Validator](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][How to︰ 建立採用自訂憑證驗證程式服務](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The custom client certificate validator.
trans-unit.target: 自訂用戶端憑證驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> when credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref>當認證為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Windows groups are included in the authorization context.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出 Windows 群組是否包含在授權內容。

trans-unit.source: This property is valid only when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509ClientCertificateAuthentication.MapClientCertificateToWindowsAccount%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是有效時，才<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509ClientCertificateAuthentication.MapClientCertificateToWindowsAccount%2A>屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509ClientCertificateAuthentication.MapClientCertificateToWindowsAccount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `false` only if you do not need to establish the list of groups a user belongs to - this may result in a performance benefit if your application and authorization decisions do not require Windows groups.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為`false`僅如果您不需要建立使用者所屬的群組清單，這可能會導致效能優勢如果您的應用程式和授權決策不需要 Windows 群組。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Windows groups are included in the authorization context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 Windows 群組是否包含在授權內容。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the certificate is mapped to Windows accounts.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出憑證是否對應到 Windows 帳戶。

trans-unit.source: When using the certificate client credential type on bindings, the certificate is not mapped to Windows accounts.
trans-unit.target: 使用繫結上的憑證用戶端認證類型，當憑證未對應到 Windows 帳戶。

trans-unit.source: You can override this behavior using this property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫此行為，使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, it causes the identity from the client certificate to be mapped to a Windows account.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，它會導致身分識別，從用戶端憑證對應至 Windows 帳戶。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the certificate is mapped to Windows accounts; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果憑證對應至 Windows 帳戶。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> when credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref>當認證為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the certificate revocation mode for ChainTrust and PeerOrChainTrust X.509 certificate validation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 ChainTrust 和 PeerOrChainTrust X.509 憑證驗證的憑證撤銷模式。

trans-unit.source: When using certificates, the system validates that the client certificate is not revoked, by checking that the client certificate is not in the revoked certificate list.
trans-unit.target: 使用憑證時，系統會驗證該用戶端憑證未撤銷，會檢查用戶端憑證不在撤銷的憑證清單中。

trans-unit.source: This check can be performed either by checking online or by checking against a cached revocation list.
trans-unit.target: 藉由線上檢查或是針對快取的撤銷清單，可以執行這項檢查。

trans-unit.source: Revocation checking can be turned off by setting this property to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode>.
trans-unit.target: 撤銷檢查可以關閉這個屬性設定為<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [Working with Certificates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][使用憑證](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: One of the values in <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode"></xref>: <xref uid="langword_csharp_NoCheck" name="NoCheck" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Online" name="Online" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Offline" name="Offline" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: One of the values in <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode"></xref>: <xref uid="langword_csharp_NoCheck" name="NoCheck" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Online" name="Online" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Offline" name="Offline" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Online" name="Online" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Online" name="Online" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> when credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref>當認證為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the trusted store location under which context the client certificate chain is validated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用戶端憑證鏈結驗證在其內容的受信任存放區位置。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether machine or user context is used to verify the X.509 certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會指定是否要將電腦或使用者內容用來驗證 X.509 憑證鏈結。

trans-unit.source: The trusted store location under which context the client certificate chain is validated.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端憑證鏈結中驗證在其內容的受信任存放區位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> when credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref>當認證為唯讀。
